org.cougaar.core.relay This package contains the Cougaar support for "relays", which are generic blackboard objects that transfer data between agents.

Uses of SimpleRelay in org.cougaar.core.relay
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.relay that implement SimpleRelay
 class SimpleRelayBase
          Abstract base class for SimpleRelay implementations.
 class SimpleRelaySource
          Source-side implementation of SimpleRelay, which creates the SimpleRelayTarget on the target's blackboard.
 class SimpleRelayTarget
          Target-side implementation of SimpleRelay, constructed by the SimpleRelaySource.
